page.shortlink: api sql connection string dialog function
page.description: The SQL_ConnectionStringDialog() function displays the Create SQL Connection String dialog, which helps you define a connection string for a SQL database. Public user defined function.
page.syntax: Connection_String as C = SQL_ConnectionStringDialog([L CreateDataBaseButton [,C InitialConnectionString [,L AllowConnectionTypeChange ]]])

argument.name: Connection_String
argument.description: Logical. A connection string for the selected database.

argument.name: CreateDataBaseButton
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .T. Indicates whether to display the create database button.
